```{r setup}
library(reportRmd)
```

## Figure Height =  5

### ggkmcif2

```{r, fig.height=5}
ggkmcif2(response = c('os_time','os_status'),
cov='cohort', times = seq(0,36,6),xlim=c(0,25),
data=pembrolizumab)

```

### ggkmcif3

```{r, fig.height=5}
ggkmcif3(response = c('os_time','os_status'),
         #type="CIF",
cov='cohort', times = seq(0,36,6),xlim=c(0,25),
pval.pos=c(18,0),
data=pembrolizumab)

```
